title: Ticket #7291: Build 32-bit shadow for RPM packaged build
description: The 32-bit shadow should built on the 64-bit build machines.
remarks:
2019-Sep-28 12:06:55 by tim:
Add to the flags as follows:
  • C_FLAGS: -m32 -march=i686
  • CXX_FLAGS: -m32 -march=i686
  • LDFLAGS: -m elf_i386 for libraries
  • LDFLAGS: -m i386linux for programs

2019-Oct-01 09:31:29 by tim:
Pacakges needed to build: glibc-devel.i686, libcgroup-devel.i686
2020-Apr-10 07:46:37 by tim:
Bulk change of target version from v080906 to v080907 using ticket-target-mover.
